thread.title: Save Consett Community Trust Catering Van
thread.title_full: Save Consett Community Trust Catering Van

title: Save Consett Community Trust Catering Van

organizations.name: save consett community trust catering van

text:
by: Kelly Williamson target: Durham County Council 
Well guys, it seems running a charity, providing much needed services and feeding children for free, isn't what folk want us to be providing.We have a meeting with the council on Monday regarding our catering van.Should they make it impossible for us to operate, we will be forced to sell up.The monies raised from our van also pay the running costs for our clothes, toy and food bank as we've been unable to secure funding! So these services will no longer be available.This is all down to 1 resident and 1 local business' constant complaints. None of which support our lOcal community !! Our goal is to continue running our catering van in Briardale and continue feeding children for free.
